title: Fiora and Tahm Kench interaction
body: Just recently i was playing top lane Fiora and was up against a Tahm Kench, when he had applied 3 stacks an acquired taste to myself I attempted to parry his devour, while it worked and I blocked his ability and CC, he was able to immediately use his devour effectively rendering my parry useless. In my mind Fiora is all about rewards well timed abilities and then punishing once that is accomplished; Tahm Kench's devour not going on cooldown really doesn't follow that. I was wondering if this was intended and if it is why?

replies.body: Can confirm, was playing Sivir and spell shielded devour (animation and all occurred) however he was still able to devour me right after
You sure he was trying to use devour as soon as he got the 3 stacks? A lot of them use the 4th Q to stun and then devour.
probs a bug send a report to riot or put this on boards with the name fiora bug and it will be fixed
